titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on manganese flake containing at least 99.5 percent by weight of manganese.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on manganese flake containing at least 99.5 percent by weight of manganese.
